aboutMeParagraphs: I'm fourth-year student at ITIS, Kazan Federal University. I have the ability to quickly learn necessary skills and adapt to new technologies. I approach work with a sense of responsibility, striving to meet deadlines and valuing the quality of the product, I always try to help my colleagues and I’m not shy about asking for help.
